EmailTemplate.name: ITL Auto Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for your Inquiry to NIST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for your inquiry to NIST. Your inquiry # {!Case.CaseNumber}, was captured by {!Case.NIST_Submitter__c} on {!Case.CreatedDate}.
Someone will get back to you as soon as possible.
If you have further questions, please call us directly at {!Case.NIST_Office_Phone__c}.
Please do not reply to this email, this mailbox is not monitored.
Sincerely,
NIST Inquiry Management
